Response:  To determine how much you can eat of the chips while maintaining your daily calorie goal of 2000 calories and having already consumed 1800 calories, we need to use the following formula:

Portion size = Total amount of food / Daily calorie goal

In this case, the total amount of food is 300g (300,000 milligrams) and your daily calorie goal is 2000 calories. Therefore, the number of portions you can have is:

Number of portions = Total amount of food / Daily calorie goal
= 300,000 mg / 2000 calories
= 150 portions

So, if you want to maintain your daily calorie goal of 2000 calories after consuming 1800 calories from the chips, you can have approximately 150 portions or 150g of chips.

Razlog jeste ovako:
Mogica se vrti iz okeana u smjeru sata, pa se na jednoj strani grada nalazi maglica koja se vrtima prema unutra. Na drugoj strani grada nalazi se prostora koji joj je udaljen 5 km, pa se maglica morala pomaknuti za toliku udaljenost. Time se može izračunati količina prostora koji se moraju pomakniti u minutama:
Prostornina prostora = Prostornina grada x Udaljenost od obale
= 42 mile x 5 km/mile
= 210 km²
Količina prostora koji se moraju pomaknuti u minutama = Prostornina prostora / Brzina vrtanja maglice (u minutama)
= 210 km² / 10 minuta
= 21 km²/minuta
Time se može vidjeti da bi maglica potrebila 36 minuta da se prekrije cijeli grad.

To solve this problem, we need to calculate the total cost of the gasoline after applying the reward for refueling at the local station.

The cost of 1 gallon of gasoline is $3, so the total cost of 10 gallons of gasoline would be:

10 gallons x $3/gallon = $30

Then, the company offers a $20 rebate for each gallon of gasoline filled up at the local station, so the total cost of the gasoline after the rebate would be:

$30 - ($20 x number of gallons) = $10

Therefore, the person has $45 left with their gasoline after applying the rebate.

Poseti u danu = Broj pacijenata u danu x Broj minuta poseta na pacijenta

Godišnja prihodnost bolnice = Godišnji broj poseta x Cena poseta/sat
= 12.000 poseta/dan x ($150/sat + $200/sat) / 365 dana
= 3600 $/dan (ili 9000 $/nedelju)
